articles.title: Cricket Australia: former NSW premier Mike Baird new chair
articles.description: Former NSW premier Mike Baird has been appointed as the new chair of Cricket Australia.
articles.content:
Australia also completed mens tours of Pakistan and Sri Lanka in trying circumstances amid security concerns.

articles.title: Brook completes sublime ton as England build lead - radio & text
articles.description: Follow live text updates and BBC Test Match Special commentary from day three of the second Test between England and Pakistan at the Multan Cricket Stadium.
articles.content:
An ugly heave and Robinson is bowled. That's 11 in the match for Abrar Ahmed.
That shot from Robinson confirms what we already knew, England are ready to get on with it now.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
